      void MigrationHandler.migrate(VirtualMachine vm, Host destinationHost)
      Migrates the given virtual machine vm to the destination host.
      The virtual machine may remain running for some time when it is being transmitted to destination host.

      void VmPlacementPolicyAbstract.unplaceVm(VirtualMachine vm) 
      void VmPlacementPolicy.unplaceVm(VirtualMachine vm)
      Takes all actions in order to unplaces the given vm.
      When all actions were taken, the VM's parent is updated (set to null).

    • Uses of VirtualMachine in com.samysadi.acs.user

      Subinterfaces of VirtualMachine in com.samysadi.acs.user 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ThinClientVirtualMachine
      A thin client VM is different from regular VMs because you cannot allocate some resources types for it (virtual ram, virtual storage, processing units).
      If you try to allocate such resources you will get an UnsupportedOperationException.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.user that implement VirtualMachine

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VirtualMachine VirtualMachine.clone()
      Creates a clone of current VM, and unsets any assigned resource on that clone (usable processing units, usable storages, usable network interfaces, virtual ram and virtual storage).
